short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Authenticator, Password Manager, Web Apps, Password Randomizer and My Favorites via XNETD Toolbox

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
First time users, please visit https://url2go.com/home/Help/Chrome-Extension-Usage for usage.

Upon a web page load, our extension examines the header of the page for information including the following.  Much of this can assist developers to quickly review how the internet sees their page.  

SEO Functions in Chrome Extension Include:
* Standard Meta Tag Information:
* Page Title
* Page Description
* Google Analyitcs Information
* Icon Information
* Keywords
* Canonical URL
* Opengraphs Information:
* OG:TITLE
* OG:DESCRIPTION
* OG:URL
* OG:IMAGE

Miscellaneous Information are tags I use in my websites.  This is for personal use when using a tool I have written for posting to social media:  
* Hashtags
* Facebook Screenname
* Twitter Screenname

Other Functions When Creating a Short URL Include:
* Create Short URL
* Associate a short URL to your account
* Share URL's
